page.title: 12"Bomber" Graham - Early Life
page.content: Interview with Herrol (Bomber) Graham, British and European Middleweight Champion. {Were you born in Sheffield?} No, I was born in Nottingham on the 13th of September,1959. That makes me 25. I'm getting on! {How old were you when you first {started boxing?} I was between 8 and 9. I was on a pair of roller skates in Faraday Road, Nottingham. There were 2 boys with their heads out of the window shouting abuse at me and because I was a black boy they called me "Blackie". I hated it. Then they said, "If you come up here we'll beat you up." Like a fool I did. I found that I enjoyed controlled violence and ever since then I've never looked back.
